description: 12 Headline Formulas with LF8 Mapping - Single Source of Truth for the Universal Brand System

core_principle.axiom: The headline's only job is to get the first sentence read. 80% of ad dollars are spent in the headline.
core_principle.evidence: Haldeman-Julius data: LF8 titles = 4-8× lift over generic titles

formulas.name: Who Else
formulas.example: Who Else Wants to Retire 10 Years Early?
formulas.mechanism: Social proof implied (others already want this). Bandwagon effect.

formulas.name: They Laughed
formulas.formula: They Laughed When I [Action], But When I [Result]...
formulas.example: They Laughed When I Said I'd Quit. Then I Showed Them My Bank Statement.
formulas.template: They Laughed When I [ACTION], But When I [RESULT]...
formulas.mechanism: Underdog story. Revenge fantasy. Status reversal.

formulas.name: Mistakes
formulas.formula: Do You Make These [Number] Mistakes in [Area]?
formulas.example: Do You Make These 7 Mistakes in Email?
formulas.template: Do You Make These [NUMBER] Mistakes in [AREA]?
formulas.mechanism: Curiosity + fear of looking foolish. Self-diagnosis invitation.

formulas.name: How To
formulas.example: How to Write Copy That Sells
formulas.mechanism: Promise of method. Implies simplicity. Tutorial framing.

formulas.name: Secret
formulas.mechanism: Gnosis need. Insider knowledge. Exclusivity implied.

formulas.name: Warning
formulas.example: Warning: This Mistake Could Cost Your Retirement
formulas.mechanism: Fear activation. Loss aversion (2× stronger than gain).

formulas.name: Give Me
formulas.formula: Give Me [Time] and I'll Give You [Result]
formulas.example: Give Me 30 Days and I'll Give You Abs
formulas.template: Give Me [TIME] and I'll Give You [RESULT]
formulas.mechanism: Fair exchange framing. Time investment clear. Result promised.

formulas.name: Discover
formulas.example: Discover the Lazy Way to Build Wealth
formulas.mechanism: Revelation framing. Implies ease. Discovery = ownership.

formulas.name: Number Ways
formulas.example: 7 Ways to Double Your Close Rate
formulas.mechanism: Listicle structure. Specific = credible. Multiple options = one will work.

formulas.name: At Last
formulas.example: At Last! A Diet That Actually Keeps Weight Off
formulas.mechanism: Implies prior failures. Vindication for skeptics. Frustration addressed.

formulas.name: What Authority
formulas.example: What Doctors Don't Tell You About Sleep
formulas.mechanism: Conspiracy framing. Us vs. them. Secret knowledge appeal (Gnosis).

formulas.name: Lies
formulas.example: 5 Lies About Passive Income That Keep You Broke
formulas.mechanism: Enemy identification. Absolution (not your fault). Truth seeker positioning.

lf8_effectiveness_ranking.description: Headline formula effectiveness by LF8 driver activation
lf8_effectiveness_ranking.note: Sexual/superiority appeals historically show highest conversion (Haldeman-Julius data)

usage_rules.reference_by: Use semantic ID (e.g., HEADLINE_LAUGHED) not number in all documents
usage_rules.selection_protocol: 1. Identify primary LF8 driver → 2. Match to formula → 3. Check awareness fit
usage_rules.testing_priority: Test LF8 titles first. Data: LF8 titles = 4-8× lift over secondary want titles.
usage_rules.customization: Templates are starting points. Adapt to brand voice while preserving structure.
